intro: Danielia splendens, commonly known as the golden flame tree, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its striking, bright yellow flowers that appear in clusters, giving it a vibrant and eye-catching appearance. The plant belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is known for its rapid growth and ability to thrive in tropical climates.
